gtladditions.item.strange_annihilation_f: §7Seems capable of constraining time and space across different dimensions

gtladditions.machine.thread_modifier_hat: §7When humans face things they don't understand, they often say 'the world shouldn't be like this'
§7Usually this only reveals their ignorance, but sometimes they're not wrong
Diverging miniature multiverse branches from the Ω baseline timeline
Can harness the power of §bAstral Array§r to converge hypothetical threads from parallel spacetime
gtladditions.machine.wireless_energy_net: Can act as a normal §6Energy Hatch/Laser Target Hatch§r providing up to §bLong.MAX§r input power
§lIn cross-recipe mode, can utilize §6§lall energy§r§l from the wireless energy network
Can act as a normal §6Dynamo Hatch/Laser Source Hatch§r providing up to §bLong.MAX§r output power
§lCan output §6§lall energy§r§l from the heart of universe to the wireless network at once
Hold a flash drive and right-click to bind/change owner, left-click to unbind.
gtladditions.multiblock.apocalyptic_tors: §7§oQuantum mechanics...delivers much, but does not really bring us any closer to the secret of Him
§7§oI, at any rate, am convinced that He does not play dice
§9§oIf the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts
§9§oCapable of reverse-calculating the future to maximize parallel processing for probabilistic recipes
§6§l100%§r probability output, while reducing probability input consumption to §6§l1/10§r
gtladditions.multiblock.arcanic_astrogra: Allows embedding §6Astral Arrays§r to increase parallel limit
gtladditions.multiblock.dimension_focus_: When installed as a module to the Molecular Assembler, unlocks §bInfinity Crafting§r mode
Allows it to complete all crafting tasks within 1 tick
gtladditions.multiblock.forge_of_the_ant: §7§oThe endpoint traversing countless miniature universes, a relic standing beyond time
§7§oThe Dwemer sought to ascend as Anumidum, transcending the Creator's dream
§7§oAll simulated universes have been annihilated, yet It still stands here
Capable of burning stellar histories into heat, crossing infinite multiversal boundaries
For our world, merely §b4 hours§r of time
Up to §6§l15x§r recipe output with stacking §6§l1/5§r EU consumption(except cells itself)
Must be installed on an active §6Forge of the Antichrist§r to function
§bShares§r boosted output and EU reduction with the host
When executing §6%s§r recipes, §bshares§r boosted output with the host
Must be installed on a §6Forge of the Antichrist§r that has reached maximum efficiency to function
gtladditions.multiblock.heart_of_the_uni: §7§oIt cannot be born, nor can it die
§7§oFluctuations curled in eleven-dimensional spacetime, the heartbeat of the universe
Insert Black Hole Seed and unfold the holographic projection on its surface
Use strange annihilation matter to compress the causality of creation planes, stealing all energy from the primordial inflation
Forcibly unfolded planes will completely annihilate within §61 second§r
Each plane possesses §64096x§r the output power of Creative Laser
Allows using §6Spheres Divergence Engine§r to simultaneously unfold multiple chaotic oceans
gtladditions.multiblock.helioflare_power: §9§oWhen you use energy sufficient to vaporize galaxies to toast bread
For basic smelting at different temperatures, performing the most fundamental heat treatment
gtladditions.multiblock.heliofluix_melti: §9§oWarning: This process violates 17 laws of thermodynamics and the law of equivalent exchange
For chaotic phase transformation of materials under stellar jets, directly converting them to liquid state
gtladditions.multiblock.heliofusion_exot: For matter exoticization at extreme temperatures
With the power of convergent light bands, capable of breaking down the fundamental components of matter
Has §k§dinfinity§r parallel, only allows locking §6one§r recipe at a time
gtladditions.multiblock.heliophase_leyli: §9§oA forbidden creation from the Void Darkness, seemingly inviting its own destruction..
Harnesses stellar power to connect scattered leyline corridors across the Nine Realms, converging all phenomena
gtladditions.multiblock.heliothermal_pla: Infuses materials with tremendous thermal energy, ionizing matter at extreme temperatures
gtladditions.multiblock.light_hunter_spa: §9§oDo not go gentle into that good night
§9§oOld age should burn and rave at close of day
§9§oRage, rage against the dying of the light
Allows installing up to §620§r Nexus Satellite Factory modules
Embedding §b64§r Astral Arrays unlocks §k§dParadoxical Attainment Theory§r, traversing higher-dimensional space
Provides §k§dinfinity§r parallel and threads to all modules
gtladditions.multiblock.macro_atomic_res: §7§oWhen I come to the end of my life, when I open my eyes for the last time in my dying moments
§7§oAll my intellect and memories disappear into the abyss of the past, returning to the pure feelings and dreams of childhood
§7§oThat is when the quantum rose smiles at me.
Has special cross-recipe parallelization, executes §6all§r recipes at once
Each recipe has the same parallel amount
In Star Core Stripper mode, for every 1200K coil temperature above base, parallel +300
Only works with §6Starmetal§r tier or higher coils
Allows embedding up to 256 §6Astral Arrays§r to increase parallel multiplier per recipe
In Element Copying mode, requires §bEternity Coil§r and §b256§r Astral Arrays to work
